column1: Table 5-11:  CH4 Emissions from Rice Cultivation (MMT CO2 Eq.)
Note: Totals may not sum due to independent rounding.
+ Does not exceed 0.05 MMT CO2 Eq.

NE (Not Estimated). State-level emissions are not estimated for 2016 through 2019 in this Inventory because data are unavailable. A surrogate data method is used to estimate emissions for these years and are produced only at the national scale.
